name: Trash Island
description:
Explore different islands and help Clemens achieve his dream of living on an island without trash.

Cleaning up the islands is not an easy task, so prepare to get your hands dirty.

Credits:

Alexander von Anhalt

Hanna Borbola

Max Bredlau

Jean Isserstedt

Martina Marchio

Carla Rother

Luisa Enciso Ulloa

Supervised by Sebastian Stamm and Steffen Walz
